thread.title: BRIEF-Chart Industries Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.85

title: BRIEF-Chart Industries Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.85
text: 46 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Chart Industries Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.85 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Chart Industries Inc: * CHART INDUSTRIES REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END RESULTS * CHART INDUSTRIES REPORTS QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.85 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.46 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 SALES ROSE 43 PERCENT TO $306 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 SALES $1.15 BILLION TO $1.2 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.65 TO $1.90 * ‍EXPECT CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $35 MILLION TO $45 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $282.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.65, REVENUE VIEW $1.18 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
